titleStmt.title: A voyage of the Sieur Le Maire to the Canary Islands, Cape-Verd, Senegal and Gamby, under Monsieur Dancourt, Director-General of the Royal African Company Printed at Paris this present year 1695. And now faithfully done into English.
titleStmt.author: Le Maire, Jacques-Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Mills and W. Turner, at the Rose and C[r]own without Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: The "r" in "Crown" failed to print in the imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
